Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign.to

This package contains implementation classes used when executing the 'to' portion of an assign activity's copy operation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AeMessagePartDataWrapper Encapsulates setting data on a complex message part (either complexType or element)
AeToBase Base class for the objects implementing the behavior in a copy operation
AeToPartnerLink Returns the partner link as a target for the copy
AeToPropertyBase Base class for selecting the target for a copy operation
AeToPropertyElement Gets the target for the copy using a propertyAlias
AeToPropertyMessage Gets the target of the copy by using a propertyAlias to select a node within a message part's complexType or element.
AeToPropertyType Gets the target for the copy using a propertyAlias
AeToQueryRunner Helper class that selects a node from an element.
AeToQueryVariableContext Implements a Jaxen variable context using the copy operation context for variable resolution.
AeToStrategyFactory Factory for creating strategies for implementing the portion of a copy operation.
AeToVariableElement Selects an element variable to assign to
AeToVariableElementWithQuery Selects data from an element variable using a query.
AeToVariableMessage Returns the message variable which will receive all of the parts of the src message
AeToVariableMessagePart Returns the message part that will receive the data
AeToVariableMessagePartWithQuery Uses a query to select a node within the message part to receive the data
AeToVariableType Gets the type value to receive the data
AeToVariableTypeWithQuery Selects data from a complex type variable using a query.
AeVariableBaseDataWrapper Base class for the variable data wrappers.
AeVariableBaseTypeDataWrapper Base class used for both simple and complex type data wrappers.
AeVariableComplexTypeDataWrapper Wraps a complex type variable being assigned to.
AeVariableElementDataWrapper The target for assigning a value to a variable that's an element
AeVariableSimpleTypeDataWrapper Wraps a simple type variable
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign.to Description

This package contains implementation classes used when executing the 'to' portion of an assign activity's copy operation.
